existing.value: Whenever you make an investigation check, you may spend a minute to also make a religion check and use the higher of the two results.

available.value: +1 intelligence
+1 to all saving throws if you have made an investigation check in the last minute
You can spend an action making an investigation or perception check to ensure your next two attacks in this encounter are guaranteed to be critical hits.
You have advantage on checks to learn creature stats
When learning creature stats, you can sacrifice a question. If you do this, you and your allies deal +1 damage with all spells and attacks against that creature. This does not stack.
You can make a disadvantaged check (of any appropriate type) to learn creature stats at the start of an encounter as a free action
You have +1 AC when a creature targets you with an attack it has already used against you.
Whenever a creature succeeds a save against one of your spells, you learn its spell save bonus for all attributes

existing.value: You have advantage on attacks that would deal necrotic damage

available.value: When you kill a humanoid with an attack or spell, it rises at the start of your next turn as a zombie that is permanently under your command, following your verbal orders to the best of its ability. You may only have 1 such zombie at any given time.
+1d4 necrotic damage with attacks with this weapon
You are resistant to necrotic damage
+3 resistance to damage from undead creatures
You learn the Finger of Death spell and may cast it once per long rest. Casting mod is a mental attribute of your choice.

existing.value: Attacks with this weapon cannot be disadvantaged

available.value: You may cast Wrathful Smite as a free action once per short rest
You and allies within 20 feet cannot be frightened if you have hit an enemy with this weapon in the last 2 rounds

If you are wielding a shield and have taken the attack action on your turn, you may make a bonus action to hit your target with your shield. They make a Strength saving throw against a DC of 8 + your prof + your STR Mod and are knocked prone on a failed save.
This weapon is considered a light weapon

existing.value: You are permanently under the effect of the Speak with Animals spell

available.value: You may cast Animal Shapes once per long rest
You may cast Conjure Animal once per short rest
You have proficiency in the Nature skill. If you already have proficiency, you have expertise.
You have proficiency in the Animal Handling skill. If you already have proficiency, you have expertise.
Beast and Plant creatures have disadvantage when attacking you
